articles.content: 17:13 Local Time, 13:13 GMT, 18:43 IST: Both teams exchange pleasantries. Afghanistan are elated and their captain Asghar Afghan (42 wins) has gone past MS Dhoni with most T20I wins as captain. 183/7… [+501 chars]
